com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory

Class AbstractRequestFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.net.request.factory.AbstractRequestFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPagingRequestFactory, AccessTokenRequestFactory, CampaignRequestFactory, CategoryRequestFactory, ClaimRequestFactory, CreditCardRequestFactory, FeedbackRequestFactory, InterstitialRequestFactory, LocationCreditRequestFactory, LocationRequestFactory, LoyaltyRequestFactory, OrderRequestFactory, PaymentTokenRequestFactory, RegistrationRequestFactory, TicketRequestFactory, UserRequestFactory, WebLinkRequestFactory, WebLinkTypeRequestFactory

    @Immutable
@LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
public abstract class AbstractRequestFactory
extends Object
    Base class for all AbstractRequest building classes.
